#summary A basic analysis for BGL file

= Introduction =

This wiki gives a quick analysis for BGL file structure. The information is mainly from  [http://www.woodmann.com/forum/showthread.php?t=7028 acidmelt's thread]


= Details =

==BGL file is a zipped record set with some header information==

  || file header ||extention  ||description                               ||format    ||
  || 0x12340003  || .BDC      ||used as cache by Babylon program          ||unknown   ||
  || 0x12340002  || .BGL      ||generated by the builder in some cases    ||studying  ||
  || 0x12340001  || .BGL      ||distributed on Babylon site               ||similar to the above  ||
